chat.trySuggested: Try one of these questions to start:
chat.suggestedQ1: Summarize the key points of this document
chat.suggestedQ3: What key concepts does this document cover?
chat.networkError: Connection lost. Please check your internet and try again.
chat.disclaimer: AI responses may be inaccurate. Always verify with the original document.
session.deleteChatConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this chat? This cannot be undone.
doc.deleteDocConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this document and all its chats?

auth.termsNotice: By continuing, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
credits.purchasePrompt: You've run out of credits. Purchase more to continue chatting.
privacy.noTraining: We never use your data for model training

home.cta.loginUpload: Log in to upload your PDF
billing.title: Purchase Credits
billing.purchaseSuccess: Purchase successful! Credits have been added to your account.
billing.error: An error occurred. Please try again.
billing.plus.title: Plus Plan
billing.pro.title: Pro Plan
common.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.
auth.loginBenefits: Sign in to upload documents, save conversations, and sync across devices
auth.privacyNote: We don't use your documents to train AI models
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1.title: Data Collection
privacy.section1.content: We collect your email address for authentication and the documents you upload for analysis.
privacy.section2.title: Data Usage
privacy.section2.item1: Your documents are NOT used to train AI models
privacy.section2.item2: Documents are only processed to provide the chat service
privacy.section2.item3: Document content is processed by AI providers (via OpenRouter) to generate responses. We do not sell your data or use it for AI training.
privacy.section3.title: Data Storage
privacy.section3.content: Documents are encrypted at rest using AES-256. You can delete your data anytime from your account settings.
privacy.section4.title: Your Rights
privacy.section4.content: You can delete your documents at any time. Contact us to request full account deletion.
privacy.section5.title: Contact
terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.section1.title: Service Description
terms.section1.content: DocTalk provides AI-powered document analysis. You upload PDFs and can ask questions about their content.
terms.section2.title: User Responsibilities
terms.section2.content: You are responsible for the content you upload. Do not upload illegal or harmful content.
terms.section3.title: Disclaimer
terms.section3.content: AI responses may contain errors. Verify important information independently.
terms.section4.title: Changes
terms.section4.content: We may update these terms. Continued use constitutes acceptance of changes.
demo.title: Choose a sample document
demo.subtitle: Experience DocTalk with these example PDFs
demo.hint: Tip: Click citation numbers [1] to jump to the source and see highlights
demo.sample.earnings.title: Alphabet Earnings Release
demo.sample.earnings.question: What was Alphabet's revenue this quarter?
demo.sample.paper.title: Attention Is All You Need
demo.sample.paper.question: How does multi-head attention work?
demo.sample.court.title: US District Court Filing
demo.sample.court.question: What are the key claims in this filing?
demo.emptyState: Ask a question about this document
demo.limitReachedMessage: You've used all 5 demo questions. Sign in for unlimited access with free credits!
demo.freeMessages: 5 free messages per document · Sign in for unlimited access
demo.rateLimitMessage: Too many requests. Please wait a moment and try again.
profile.title: Profile
profile.usage.otherNote: Includes usage from older DocTalk versions using different AI configurations.
profile.usage.noData: No usage data yet. Start chatting with your documents!
profile.account.deleteWarning: This will permanently delete your account, all documents, chats, and data. This action cannot be undone.
profile.account.deleteConfirm: Type your email to confirm deletion
profile.account.exportDesc: Download a copy of all your DocTalk data including profile, documents metadata, conversations, and credit history.
landing.headline:
Every answer cites
the exact page.
landing.subtitle: Upload any document. Ask questions. Get answers with page-level citations you can verify in one click.
landing.description: Drop in a PDF, Word doc, spreadsheet, or URL. Ask anything. DocTalk finds the answer and shows you exactly where it came from — page number, highlighted passage, one click to verify.
landing.showcase.title: See it in action
landing.showcase.caption: Ask a question, get an answer, click the citation to jump straight to the source
landing.features.title: Built for serious readers
landing.feature.answers.title: Find anything in seconds
landing.feature.answers.desc: Ask any question about your document and get a precise answer. No more scrolling. No more Ctrl+F. Just ask.
landing.feature.citations.title: Every answer has a source
landing.feature.citations.desc: Numbered citations link to the exact page. Click one and the passage highlights on screen — verify without losing your place.
landing.feature.privacy.title: Your documents stay yours
landing.feature.privacy.desc: Never used for AI training. Encrypted in transit and at rest. Delete anytime — no questions asked.
landing.howItWorks.title: How it works
landing.howItWorks.step1.title: Upload your document
landing.howItWorks.step1.desc: PDF, Word, PowerPoint, Excel, text files, or paste a web URL. Drag, drop, done.
landing.howItWorks.step2.title: Ask questions
landing.howItWorks.step2.desc: Type naturally — like asking a colleague who just read the whole thing
landing.howItWorks.step3.title: Get verified answers
landing.howItWorks.step3.desc: Every answer cites specific pages. Click a citation to jump straight to the source.
landing.social.title: DocTalk by the numbers
landing.security.title: Your data, your control
landing.security.noTraining.title: No AI Training
landing.security.noTraining.desc: Your documents never train AI models. Period.
landing.security.encrypted.title: Encrypted Storage
landing.security.encrypted.desc: TLS in transit, AES-256 at rest. Industry standard protection.
landing.security.deletion.title: Delete Anytime
landing.security.deletion.desc: Remove your data from all active systems whenever you want.
landing.security.private.title: Private by Default
landing.security.private.desc: Only you can access your documents. No sharing, no exceptions.
landing.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
landing.faq.q1: How accurate are the AI answers?
landing.faq.a1: Every answer includes numbered citations that link to the exact passage in your document. Click any citation to jump to the source and see it highlighted. You always verify the AI's work yourself.
landing.faq.a2: DocTalk supports PDF, DOCX, PPTX, XLSX, TXT, and Markdown files, plus web URLs. PDFs include scanned documents via built-in OCR. Files up to 50MB and 500 pages are supported.
landing.faq.a3: Absolutely. Your documents are TLS encrypted in transit and AES-256 encrypted at rest, never used for AI training, and you can delete them anytime. We follow privacy-first principles.
landing.faq.q4: Which AI models can I use?
landing.faq.a4: DocTalk offers 3 performance modes — Quick, Balanced, and Thorough — each optimized with different AI models for different needs. Free users can use Quick and Balanced modes. Upgrade to Plus to unlock Thorough mode.
landing.faq.a5: Yes! Free accounts include 500 credits per month, enough for dozens of questions. No credit card required to get started.
landing.faq.a6: Yes. DocTalk handles documents up to 500 pages with smart chunking and semantic search, ensuring accurate answers even from very long documents.
landing.finalCta.title: Stop re-reading. Start asking.
landing.finalCta.subtitle: Upload a document and get your first cited answer in under a minute. No credit card required.
billing.comparison.title: Plan Comparison
models.upgradeToPlusTooltip: Upgrade to Plus to use this model
instructions.title: Custom Instructions
instructions.description: Tell the AI how to analyze this document. These instructions will be included in every chat message.
instructions.placeholder: e.g., Focus on financial data and provide numbers in USD. Summarize in bullet points.

upload.unsupportedFormat: Unsupported file format. Please upload PDF, DOCX, PPTX, XLSX, TXT, or MD.

auth.errorAccessDenied: Access was denied. Please try again.
auth.errorAccountNotLinked: This email is already associated with another sign-in method. Please use your original sign-in method.
auth.errorDefault: An error occurred during sign in. Please try again.
auth.emailUnavailable: Email sign-in is temporarily unavailable. Please try another method.
auth.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
auth.resendFailed: Failed to resend. Please try again.

tour.citation.title: Cited Answers
tour.citation.desc: Click any [1] citation to see the exact source highlighted in your document.
tour.mode.title: AI Performance Modes
tour.mode.desc: Quick for fast answers, Balanced for detail, Thorough for deep analysis.
tour.plus.title: More Options
tour.plus.desc: Set custom AI instructions or export your conversation.
tour.session.title: Chat Sessions
tour.session.desc: Create multiple chats per document to explore different topics.
